input_text:
Job Title: Analytics Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Description

We are seeking a dedicated Analytics Developer/Business Intelligence Developer to lead the creation, execution, and continuous refinement of our analytics and business intelligence reporting initiatives. This pivotal role requires a blend of technical proficiency and leadership skills to not only elevate the quality of our reporting systems but also foster the development of our reporting capabilities.

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

 Master Data Management: Work with the DBA team on the creation and ongoing management of master data processes utilizing SQL, ensuring the highest standards of data accuracy, consistency, and reliability across the organization.  Data Quality and Cleaning: Address data quality issues, clean transactional data, and contribute to the enhancement of overall data quality, thereby improving the trustworthiness of analytics results.  Analytics Development: Develop and implement robust data-driven solutions using SQL and higher-level coding languages, focusing on optimizing data schema and structure to unlock meaningful insights.  Business Intelligence Development: Create dynamic reports and dashboards using tools such as Power BI, or Jupyter Notebooks. This role requires a strong foundation in SQL and a deep understanding of the specific data needs within the business.  Self-Serve Analytics Support: Support the establishment and maintenance of self-service analytics platforms, enabling teams across the organization to extract and analyze data independently. 

QUALIFICATIONS: 

A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, with a Master’s degree being a significant plus. Demonstrable experience in analytics and business intelligence development, with a strong emphasis on master data management. Proficient in SQL, with the ability to efficiently create data visualizations and a solid foundation in Python. A keen interest in progressing towards a Data Engineer/Full Stack Developer role. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills. Extensive background in database technologies, evidenced by a successful history in database design, implementation, and maintenance. Comprehensive expertise in major database management systems (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL) and familiarity with cloud-based database platforms (e.g., AWS RDS, Azure Database). A track record of optimizing databases for performance, conducting performance tuning, and troubleshooting. Advanced SQL programming skills, along with knowledge of other programming languages. Expertise in data modeling and database design principles, with the ability to develop scalable database architectures. Excellent communication skills, characterized by clarity, empathy, and respect in interactions with both team members and internal stakeholders. Proven leadership ability, with a strong desire to lead and grow a team in a collaborative and progressive environment. Commitment to mentoring and guiding team members, fostering an atmosphere of learning and development. 

This role is ideal for someone who is technically skilled, leadership-oriented, and passionate about leveraging data to drive business intelligence and analytics forward.

Individual compensation packages are based on various factors unique to each candidate, including skill set, experience, qualifications, location, and other job-related reasons. Stream Data Centers offers annual bonus, benefits, flexible time off (vacation), 401k and a variety of other perks and benefits.

_________________________________________________________________________

Stream is an equal-opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of ethnicity, race, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, military status, or any other reason prohibited by law. Note: Nothing in this job description restricts management’s right to assign or reassign duties and responsibilities to this job at any time.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
